title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Self-knowledge and originality win out over book smarts today. Trying to follow someone elses rules and guidelines to the letter may not gel with your unique circumstances. Succumbing to frustration only leads to psyching yourself out. Instead, convert your exasperation into permission to do things on your own terms. Nevertheless, combining your experience and inspiration with the wisdom of others empowers you to create an even richer future. Ideally, teacher and student are one and the same. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
